name: Death Follows (dhiaaz)
description:
Submission for the AGC Game Jam by team 0xC0DECAFE

Distraught with the sudden death of his wife,  El Rougi vows to join her eternally by plunging himself off of a cliff into a dark cave. However he wakes up to find himself still in the flesh, his soul wasn't granted the rite of passage and now El Rougi finds himself neither human nor soul, but the perfect mixture of both. He uses his newfound powers to navigate the old catacombs, secretly hoping that his wife met a similar fate for one more chance to meet her again.

Gameplay:

The goal is to acquire the key in each puzzle and use it to unlock the next stage. You move around with the arrow keys, you can also jump with the spacebar while in human form. Ghost form allows you to fly around the level but certain obstacles won't let you through. 

To become a ghost, put yourself in harm's way (look for something dangerous!). To go back to human form, get another chance from the green mushroom!
